|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = Bluetooth |rad1freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Model Part Num: 90-IG0500E000-01PZ :Supports iPod/iPhone Power input: 5V/1.2A or 4x AA batteries.
==Specifications== *Model Name: ASUS SP-BT23 *Driver units: 2x 1" (25mm) / 3W (4Ω) :RMS Power Output: 1.6W ±0.3W (THD=10%) :Output Sound Pressure Level: 80dB ±3dB :S/N Ratio: 70dB, Cross Talk: 50dB *Frequency Response: 20 Hz ~ 20KHz :Resonant Frenquency: Fo=300Hz ±20% :Speaker Effective Frequency Band: 150Hz ~ 20KHz *Audio Quality: 44.1/48KHz (16bit Stereo) :Input Sensitivity: 560mV ±50mV :Audio Level: 870mV ±100mV :Audio S/N Ratio: >75dB, Audio THD: <1% :Audio Format: SBC; Volume Control: Fixed *Standard: Bluetooth V1.2 (Class 2) :Carrier Frequency: 2.400 ~ 2.4835 GHz :RF Output Power: 0 ~ +2 dBm (Class 2) :Receiving Sensitivity (GFSK): < -80dBm at <0.1% BER :Transmission Coverage: 10 m in open space (Class 2) :Windows Profies: A2DP only (AVRCP, HSP, HFP Optional) *Power Source: AC: 100~240V 50~60 Hz; DC: 5V 1200mA; *Dimensions: 170mm x 120mm x 54mm (WxHxD); Weight: 400g
==Links of Interest== [http://ftp.tekwind.co.jp/pub/asustw/wireless/SP-BT23/ Manual]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:2008Computex ASUS SP-BT23.jpg|ASUS SP-BT23 </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[ASUS AiCam]] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] *[[ASUS Internet Radio (AIR)]] *[[ASUS Internet Radio 3 (AIR3)]] *[[ASUS TUF Dongle]] - Bluetooth Dongle • MSQ-TUFDONGLE *[[ASUS BT180]] - Bluetooth Module • MSQBT180 (2007-07-11) *[[ASUS BT183]] - Bluetooth Module • MSQBT183 (2005-08-04) *[[ASUS RC-BT]] - Bluetooth Module • MSQRCBLUETOOTH (2009-12-24) *[[ASUS USB-BT211]] - Tiny Bluetooth Dongle • MSQ-USBBT211 ([http://ftp.tekwind.co.jp/pub/asustw/wireless/USB-BT211/ 2009-12-07]) *[[ASUS USB-BT400]] - Bluetooth USB Dongle • MSQ-USBBT400 (2012-11-08) :USB 2.0 (type A), BT 4.0 LE, Class 2, 4 dBm - [[Bluetooth devices]] *[[ASUS GPS BT100]] ([http://ftp.tekwind.co.jp/pub/asustw/wireless/GPS%20BT100/ 2005]), [[ASUS NAS-M25]] ([http://ftp.tekwind.co.jp/pub/asustw/wireless/NAS-M25/ 2011])
